Name: Dice Of Knights
About the game: Roll the dice, swing the sword and let the magic talk! Dice of Knights is a turn based battle game where everything depends on luck and magic. Gather your friends in your home or use Steam Remote Play and fight each other in this 7x7 doomed world. Build and destroy towers to reshape the world. Attack other players with your allmighty dice and use magic effects at the right moment to be the last knight standing. Good luck, knight. We believe in luck and you should believe, too. Because only luck can guide you through this merciless battle. Need friends to play? Join our Discord server, maybe you can find friends. Check right menu bar to join.
